content.text: Match ends, FC Groningen 4, Aston Villa 1.
Second Half ends, FC Groningen 4, Aston Villa 1.
Goal!  FC Groningen 4, Aston Villa 1. Dino Islamovic (FC Groningen) left footed shot from the left side of the six yard box to the centre of the goal. Assisted by Jarchinio Antonia.
Jores Okore (Aston Villa) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Dino Islamovic (FC Groningen).
Roland Baas (FC Groningen) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Charles N'Zogbia (Aston Villa).
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Substitution, FC Groningen. Roland Baas replaces Stéfano Magnasco because of an injury.
Delay in match Stéfano Magnasco (FC Groningen) because of an injury.
Corner,  Aston Villa. Conceded by Johan Kappelhof.
Foul by Gary Gardner (Aston Villa).
Tom Hiariej (FC Groningen) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Delay in match Stéfano Magnasco (FC Groningen) because of an injury.
Foul by Charles N'Zogbia (Aston Villa).
Stéfano Magnasco (FC Groningen) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Nick van der Velden (FC Groningen).
Enda Stevens (Aston Villa) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Goal!  FC Groningen 3, Aston Villa 1. Charles N'Zogbia (Aston Villa) from a free kick with a left footed shot to the top right corner.
Alan Hutton (Aston Villa) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Yoëll van Nieff (FC Groningen).
Substitution, Aston Villa. Chris Herd replaces Nathan Baker.
Substitution, Aston Villa. Gary Gardner replaces Ashley Westwood.
Substitution, Aston Villa. Jack Grealish replaces Gabriel Agbonlahor.
Substitution, Aston Villa. Enda Stevens replaces Ciaran Clark.
Substitution, FC Groningen. Michael de Leeuw replaces Rasmus Lindgren.
Substitution, FC Groningen. Dino Islamovic replaces Danny Hoesen.
Substitution, Aston Villa. Jores Okore replaces Philippe Senderos.
Substitution, Aston Villa. Charles N'Zogbia replaces Darren Bent.
Substitution, Aston Villa. Karim El Ahmadi replaces Andreas Weimann.
Substitution, Aston Villa. Leandro Bacuna replaces Fabian Delph.
Corner,  FC Groningen. Conceded by Kieran Richardson.
Attempt blocked. Danny Hoesen (FC Groningen) left footed shot from the left side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Nick van der Velden.
Corner,  FC Groningen. Conceded by Alan Hutton.
Offside, Aston Villa. Ashley Westwood tries a through ball, but Alan Hutton is caught offside.
Attempt saved. Johan Kappelhof (FC Groningen) right footed shot from the right side of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Stéfano Magnasco.
Ciaran Clark (Aston Villa) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Nick van der Velden (FC Groningen) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Ciaran Clark (Aston Villa).
Attempt missed. Kieran Richardson (Aston Villa) left footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the left. Assisted by Ashley Westwood following a set piece situation.
Darren Bent (Aston Villa) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Johan Kappelhof (FC Groningen).
Attempt blocked. Rasmus Lindgren (FC Groningen) right footed shot from more than 35 yards is blocked. Assisted by Johan Kappelhof.
Second Half begins FC Groningen 3, Aston Villa 0.
First Half ends, FC Groningen 3, Aston Villa 0.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Delay in match Stéfano Magnasco (FC Groningen) because of an injury.
Attempt blocked. Tjaronn Chery (FC Groningen) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
Foul by Ciaran Clark (Aston Villa).
Tjaronn Chery (FC Groningen) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Attempt blocked. Jarchinio Antonia (FC Groningen) right footed shot from the left side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Danny Hoesen.
Goal!  FC Groningen 3, Aston Villa 0. Jarchinio Antonia (FC Groningen) right footed shot from very close range to the top right corner. Assisted by Danny Hoesen.
Foul by Alan Hutton (Aston Villa).

Goal!  FC Groningen 1, Aston Villa 0. Tjaronn Chery (FC Groningen) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Nick van der Velden.
